traj_an

Functions

analysis_opt(traj_file, molecules, maindict)

Choice between picture or analysis mode.

frame_question(traj_file)

Question for the user to specify the start frame and the frame interval.

prepare_frame(an, frame, element_masses, ...)

Preparing the frame for the analysis module by removing atoms, which are not needed.

process_trajectory(traj_file, molecules, an, ...)

Process the trajectory file.

region_question(traj_file)

Question for the user if the calculation should be performed in a specific region.

run_analysis(traj_file, molecules, maindict)

Run the analysis based on the user's choice.

run_trajectory_module(an, frame, ...)

Run the trajectory module based on the file format.

Analysis

class conan.analysis_modules.traj_an.Analysis(traj_file, molecules, maindict)

Bases: object

analysis_choice(traj_file) → int

Choose the analysis to be performed.

get_traj_module(traj_file) → callable

Get the trajectory module based on the file format. Based on the file format, each frame needs to be processed differently.
